Preference.android:title: Link a new device
Preference.android:summary: Click here to choose your server and link a device

ListPreference.android:title: Network server
ListPreference.android:summary: Choose the network server type your network is using.

EditTextPreference.android:title: MQTT username
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The MQTT username. This is normally also the ID of the application.

EditTextPreference.android:title: MQTT Password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The MQTT password. This is sometimes called the Access Key of the application. ex: ttn-account-v2.aB...

EditTextPreference.android:title: MQTT topic
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The MQTT topic to subscribe to for receiving uplink messages from the mapping device.

EditTextPreference.android:title: MQTT broker URL
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The MQTT URL of the message broker. ex: eu.thethings.network:1883

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Upload data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Upload all measured points to ttnmapper.org
Mark uploaded data as experimental to exclude it from the main global map of coverage

EditTextPreference.android:title: Experiment name
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The name under which this experiment will be saved on ttnmapper.org

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Custom server
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When selected also uploads data to your own server using an HTTP POST

EditTextPreference.android:title: Custom server address
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The URL of the API endpoint where you want to POST data to. This has to be HTTPS.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto center
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Keep the map centred around your location

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto zoom
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Zoom the map to always keep all points in view

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: LoRdrive mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show gateways and signal paths on map
Show all previously mapped coverage from ttnmapper.org

ListPreference.android:title: Background map
ListPreference.android:summary: Select which map service to use as the background map

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep screen on
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Screen will not dim and lock while the app is open

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Play sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Play a notification sound when a new packet is received

Preference.android:title: Notification sound
Preference.android:summary: The sound that should be played when a packet is received

Preference.android:title: Email & Copy Log Output
Preference.android:summary: To report a bug you can paste these logs into an email and send it to android@ttnmapper.org
